site_name: Land Rear Of Brent Terrace (South)Brent TerraceCricklewoodLondonNW2 1BX
description: Submission of details pursuant to Condition 13 ( External Lighting Design) of planning permission 18/5647/EIA dated 14 December 2018 for the construction of a train stabling facility involving the installation of railway tracks, vehicle barriers and bollards and a buffer stop; construction of pedestrian and drivers walkways; erection of pedestrian access gates, vehicle restraint barriers, overhead line equipment, noise barriers, and lighting columns; provision of single storey modular buildings, parking spaces, and construction compounds; and the realignment of existing Midland Main Line railway tracks to serve the new Train Station
